name: Spades Online - Card Game
description:
Play Spades online and find out our new surprise that will make your games more interesting and colourful!
Find new ways to get more chips! New scratch cards for extra chips! Join us now and start winning!

KEY FEATURES OF THE GAME
- Blitz Tournaments for 8 or 16 players!
- Promo Tournaments and League play!
- Play Spades with your friends, send them gifts and socialize with others.
- Entertaining gameplay!
- Enjoy free chips every day.
- Strong social element embedded in the game, including chat, gifts, gallery and more, to further improve the experience.
- Meet new people, easy dating functionality.

WHY PLAY?
- High quality Spades in Multiplayer.
- Different game modes available - Pairs, Solo, Mirror, Whiz and Suicide.
- HD graphics and a modern design.

Play Spades now at VIP Spades! One of the most entertaining card games out there! Discover VIP Spades, a fun, friendly and strategic card game. Spades is not just another trick-taking card game, it is one of the most popular card games in the US and in many other countries. Join the social Spades game!

Download VIP Spades now, get your free chips and find new friends!
Spades is a 52-card trick-taking game similar to Hearts, Bridge and Euchre.
The game is free and easy to play! VIP Spades is very fast and responsive, with card animation for a more realistic gameplay.

Do you wish to play against real players and meet new people, passionate about Spades?
VIP Spades allows you to play against other players on your level.
Whether you’re a beginner or a pro, VIP Spades is ideal for all Spades players and card game lovers.

WHAT’S NEXT?
VIP Spades continues to evolve! For upcoming releases and improvements to the game - stay tuned!

TRUE FANS OF VIP SPADES?

We’d love to hear from you as we are constantly looking at new ways to improve and develop the Spades community!
